Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory553.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon Bane', 3: 'Ahem... Dammit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon Bane', 3: 'Whoever dares mess with Gung-hoers shall pay a heavy price!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Well said, but why do you keep moving back?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Huh? The door is over there. You're going to the window...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Pulao can finish her line, Demon Bane has already broken through the window nearby and disappeared on the street.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucky Dog & Ding Gold', 3: 'Wait for us, Demon Bane!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The other minions quickly go through the same hole that he left, leaving a completely wrecked window behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No! We saved a long time to fix that window!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "They're gone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Whatever. I'll go check it out, Master. Hope we can still fix it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Master', 3: 'Leave it to me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Master walks past Pulao and heads to the window, but Pulao senses something unusual from his words.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Master', 3: "What's wrong? You seem to have something to say.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Um, Master, your voice doesn't sound right. Are you sick?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Master', 3: "No, I'm fine. I'm very healthy. I can walk up five floors without panting... Cough... cough...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'How is that "fine"?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao rushes to Master as he kneels on the ground. He is unable to control his limbs. His eyes are turning red.'}
{3: "Master wipes Pulao's anxious tears with a trembling hand. He smiles at her."}
{2: 'Master', 3: 'Well, I thought it was just a cold. This "Punini" virus hits harder than I think.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Have you been like this for a while...? Why didn't you tell me...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Master', 3: "Because I don't want to see you like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Um... You always treat me like a kid, Master.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'm no longer that kid who always made people worry.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What to do... Argh... Should I get you some medicine?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Master', 3: "No need. Besides, I don't think medicine can cure this disease.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Medicine... Right, ordinary medicine probably won't work.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Master', 3: 'Are you thinking of that legend?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Yes! I heard there was an old celestial in the mountains. He has an elixir that could cure any disease!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'If I can get that elixir, we can cure whatever Puni-thing you have.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Master', 3: "No need. A lot of things happened today, I'm probably just tired. I just need some rest, and everything will be fine.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao helps Master get on his feet. She gazes at him and mumbles.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You have always been taking care of me, Master. Now it's my turn to take care of you!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao raises her head and looks Master firmly in the eye.'}
{2: 'Master', 3: 'Do you have to go?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master', 3: "Hmm... Alright. My brother would laugh at me if I still can't make up my mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Master', 3: 'One moment please.', 4: '1'}

{3: "Master knocks on the wall nearby. Heavy clangs of gears turning can be heard inside. Before long, the wooden wall suddenly cracks open and a wooden crate pops out from within, falling into Pulao's hands."}
{3: 'Pulao looks at the crate and sees three words written in exaggerated calligraphy styleâ€”"It\'s a sword".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Master', 3: "You don't know what will happen along the way. I hope it can protect you on my behalf.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When the crate is opened, it dissipates an antique aroma.'}
{3: 'Sunlight shines upon the sword through the window, leaving a golden reflection in the inscription on it.'}
{3: "Master nods at Pulao and she nods in return. She grabs the red ribbon on the sword's hilt. It gives a warm feeling."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Wait for me, Master.', 4: '1'}
